job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongEtsy is the global marketplace for unique and creative goods We build power and evolve the tools and technologies that connect entrepreneurs with buyers around the world As an Etsy employee youll tackle unique problems alongside talented coworkers committed to Keeping Commerce Human Weaposre large enough that youaposll focus on meaningful complex challenges but small enough that you can make a rewarding impactbrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongEtsy is hiring a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join our Ads Ranking team This opportunity is excellent for someone who is interested in applying machine learning to tackle userfacing problemsbrbrThe primary goal of the team is to improve the relevance of Etsys onsite ads and to price the ads fairly and efficiently Much of this work relies on improving the accuracy of machine learning models that power our clickthroughrate prediction and automatic bidding systems We also develop new product experiences driven by machine learning systemsbrbrOur team works on both the development of these models as well as the tooling we use to train evaluate deploy introspect and monitor thembrbrstronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongOur team is responsible for ranking and pricing ads on behalf of our sellers on Etsys website and mobile apps This is an opportunity for you to play a major role in connecting our buyers with Etsys 90 million listings through our MLfueled ad platformbrbrHeres a taste of the problems were solvingbrulliHow does the team ensure that the right ads are put in front of the right buyersliliHow can we help our sellers set bids to achieve the highest rate of returnliliHow do we rank millions of ads in a matter of milliseconds so that were giving our buyers the best experience while maximizing revenueliliHow do we maintain a pipeline that scales for our 40 million buyers and sellersliliHow can we detect bad actors in our system to protect sellersbrliulYour work will span our stack touching Python TensorFlow Scala Spark and Google managed services such as BigQuery Dataflow and AI Platform We are proud to have an engineering culture that supports career growth and learningbrbrYou can learn more one of our recent projects on our Engineering blogbrbrhttpscodeascraftcom20210323howwebuiltacontextspecificbiddingsystemforetsyadsbrbrWe are languageagnostic in our approach to interviewingbrbrThis is a fulltime position located eventually in our Brooklyn NY office We offer flexible workplace policies that can accommodate work from home candidates who are comfortable traveling to an office location 23 times per weekbrbrMany Etsy roles are open to remote candidates and youaposll be able to identify which ones within the location header of each job description For candidates who will work remotely from Colorado visit this link for information related to Coloradoaposs Equal Pay for Equal Work ActbrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongYou will do well in this role if youbrstrongulliHave experience training deploying monitoring debugging and iterating on production machine learning systemsliliAre proficient with databases SQL and scripting languages liliHave the ability to apply statistical techniques to tackle real problemsliliHave successfully taken requirements from design through to delivery both independently and with a team liliWrite understandable testable code and you have an eye towards maintainabilityliliCare about the implications of your work on end usersbrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongstrongWhataposs NextbrbrstrongIf youaposre interested in joining the team at Etsy please send a cover letter and resume telling us why youaposd be right for the position As youaposve hopefully seen already Etsy is a place that values individuality and variety We donapost want you to be like everyone else  we want you to be like you So write to us and tell us what youaposre all aboutbrbrstrongOur PromisebrbrstrongAt Etsy we believe that a diverse equitable and inclusive workplace makes us a more relevant more competitive and more resilient company We encourage people from all backgrounds ages abilities and experiences to apply Etsy is an equal opportunity employer We do not discriminate on the basis of race color ancestry religion national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital or family status disability gender gender identity or expression pregnancy or caregiver status veteran status or any other legally protected status We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations to participate in the job application and interview process to perform essential job functions and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment While Etsy supports visa sponsorship sponsorship opportunities may be limited to certain roles and skillsets
